segments.text: I see the open window above the sink, letting in a lot of light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman planted those bushes herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos happening inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the path leading through the garden, inviting and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman would rather be out there than dealing with this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing and ruining the peaceful atmosphere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children ever play in the garden or if they prefer to stay inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the garden is a reflection of the woman's hard work and dedication.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets to enjoy it soon, without any interruptions.
segments.speaker: PAR
